definition[0]: a British television comedysketch show written by Matt Lucas and David Walliams who also play the main characters. The actor Tom Baker is a narrator on the show. Characters on the programme include Bubbles Devere (a fat woman at a health spa), Daffyd (a gayWelsh man), Andy (a man in a wheelchair) and his carer Lou, Emily Howard and Florence (two transvestites), and Marjorie Dawes (leader of a weight loss support groupsupport group).
